item.title: Doctor Who Exposed Trans Procedures On Kids Pleads For Trump To Stop DOJ From Jailing Him Within Days
item.description: The DOJ has been prosecuting Eithan Haim for exposing child transgender interventions. He may soon face jail, despite Trump's executive order ordering...

item.title: USDA Raises Eyebrows With Hire Of Seed Oil Lobbyist As Agency Chief Of Staff
item.description: Buller's appointment became a trending topic on X after Rep. Thomas Massie, R-Ky., posted the USDA press release.

item.title: Exclusive: Records Detail Hefty Higher Ed DEI Spending As Trump Orders DEI To Die
item.description: An Open the Books review of payroll records finds diversity, equity and inclusion programs pay well at Berkeley and Georgia Tech.

item.title: Trump Is Right About Birthright Citizenship
item.description: Trump isn’t rewriting the 14th Amendment; he’s applying the law as it is, based on its plain language and the Supreme Court’s existing precedent.

item.title: What ‘Wicked’ And The Not-So-Wonderful Wizard Teach About The Power Of Propaganda
item.description: Although much of the buzz around 'Wicked' has focused on 'queering,' it is the concepts of propaganda and tyranny that drive the film.
